alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 5:05PM MDT until July 01 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central South Dakota, including the following counties, Meade and Pennington. * WHEN...Until 815 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 503 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Box Elder is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Flooding has been reported along North Ellsworth Road and also over Tower and Liberty Roads. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northeastern Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base and Box Elder.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
